review_title: Group of good people determined to provide quality health service to the community
pros:
Awesome work culture 
Human sensitive organization
Aligned with the mission to serve the needy. 
Exposure and learning sessions organised regularly
Prioritises work life balance
cons: Nothing much that I can find.

review_title: association with intelehealth in the areas of health
pros: intelehealth A working platform with which we can easily provide better healthcare facilities to the people. Intellehealth provides a digital platform through which we can reach out to the backward people of rural areas and benefit from it and by using it we can save people with good health facility money and labor.
cons: I have not lost anything by working in IntelHealth, we had worked in all other sectors except health, so we have got to learn a lot.

review_title: Great place to work  & to make a difference in the community / public health
pros:
1. Work from home (5 days a week) / felxi hours
2. Amazing employee benefits
3. Promotes learning within team and organisation
4. Provides health insurance
5. Preach and reinforce work life balance 
6. Cooperative teams
cons: Nothing much to share here

review_title: Intelehealth is the fastest ingrowing non-profit organization.
job_title: QA Automation Engineer in Aurangābād, Maharashtra
pros:
1. Firstly thanks for giving me this opportunity to work with non-Profit organization. 
2. Working in the health care sector.
3. Organization culture is fantastic.
4. Supportive staff.
5.Out of the work they doing extra activity like a fitness yoga session , fun Friday session.
cons: No downside of working with intelehealth.

review_title: Great Company To Start Your Career
pros:
For Trainees Intelehealth Provides Training On Top Notch Technology. Like Node Js, Angular. 
Salary On Time.
Permanent Work From Home.
FunFriday Conducted Every Week.
cons: No Cons Seen So Far.

review_title: Very good company with  a really great culture

cons: I have not faced any kind of issues/problems

pros: No time wastage learn more thing in that time ,learn new skills

pros: Work life balance is maintained. work culture is awesome

pros: The product is not bad, has a lot of potential for what it's worth.
cons: Absolutely horrendous place to work. The culture is comparable to any infamous "lala company" (no tolerance for disagreement, frequently late salaries, random firings, yelling at employees). The management frequently goes back on the promises they make, priorities change every day since there is no vision.

review_title: Lack of vision / no tech culture / unprofessionalism
pros:
Earlier there used to be some autonomy.

Mission driven organization.
cons:
No proper tech culture.

Extreme deadlines, management lacks proper tech understanding, every day there is a new and random requirement without any proper plan.

Rough culture which is thoroughly unprofessional, seniors are often rude, yell.

The attrition rate is fairly high, that coupled with a lack of focus on processes all but ensures that any new hires are far from useful for many months post hiring.

There is a lot of dependance on interns which results in all sorts of continuity problems.

pros: Flexible working hours, work life balance and Liberating work culture
cons: No Health insurance and PF benefits to employees

pros: Flexible working hours, your ideas are welcomed
cons: No health insurance and PF benifits to employees

pros:
App / developers are good

cons:

Despite efforts, the organization is finding it very hard to grow, which also results in pay / work stagnation for employees

pros: Good product and great learning curve.
cons:
1. The top management doesn't have any idea of how a company is run. Seems like a family business. 
2. John hopkins tag keeps giving them projects other wise, this company would cease to exist. 
3. Too much pressure, no human connection. Inhuman behaviour of top management 
4. No sticking to their own words or honoring contracts. Keep going back on their own words. 
5. No positive appreciation at all. Too much negative energy all around within the company 
6. No sense of clarity. The company leadership would do good with some self introspection of the high attrition rate. 
7. Not receptive to feedback at all.

review_title: You won't find a better workplace!
pros:
- Mission-oriented, impact-first approach
- One of the best org cultures
- Encourages innovation, initiatives and provides an environment to experiment
- Such a talent house, never a dull day!
- No dearth of opportunities to learn and grow
- If you love challenges, you'd love it here!
cons: Too much to do, too little time

review_title: Growing company, exciting work opportunities and good work culture

Good work culture 
Flat hierarchy allows and encourages opinions in process building
Challenging work and opportunities to grow
Lots to learn and contribute
cons: Not exactly a con but as everywhere, working hours can run long in times of deadlines, important events,etc.
